_package_info.description: Character backgrounds for space-faring civilizations including starship crews, colonists, military personnel, scientists, and those who encounter alien life
_package_info.author: Storymaster

background.name: Starship Captain
background.description: Commander of interstellar vessels responsible for crew, cargo, and navigation across the galaxy. Experienced leader making critical decisions in the void of space.

background.name: Space Marine
background.description: Elite military soldier trained for combat in zero gravity and hostile alien environments. Equipped with powered armor and advanced weaponry.

background.name: Xenobiologist
background.description: Scientist specializing in the study of alien life forms and ecosystems. First contact specialist analyzing extraterrestrial biology and behavior.

background.name: Colony Administrator
background.description: Government official managing frontier settlements on newly terraformed worlds. Balances resource allocation, population growth, and interplanetary politics.

background.name: Smuggler
background.description: Independent trader operating outside galactic law enforcement. Transports contraband, refugees, and sensitive cargo through dangerous space routes.

background.name: Galactic Diplomat
background.description: Ambassador representing human or alien interests in interspecies negotiations. Mediates conflicts between different worlds and civilizations.

background.name: Asteroid Miner
background.description: Resource extraction specialist working in dangerous conditions to harvest minerals from space rocks. Lives for months in cramped mining vessels.

background.name: Cybernetic Engineer
background.description: Technical specialist maintaining robotic systems, AI networks, and cybernetic implants aboard starships and space stations.

background.name: Planetary Explorer
background.description: Scout and surveyor who investigates uncharted worlds for colonization potential. First to set foot on alien soil and catalog new discoveries.

background.name: Space Station Commander
background.description: Administrator overseeing orbital facilities that serve as trade hubs, research centers, or military outposts in strategic star systems.

background.name: Interstellar Merchant
background.description: Trader conducting business across multiple star systems. Negotiates deals for exotic goods, rare materials, and alien technologies.

background.name: Terraforming Specialist
background.description: Engineer who transforms hostile planets into habitable worlds. Uses massive machinery and biological agents to alter atmospheric conditions.

background.name: Galactic Bounty Hunter
background.description: Licensed tracker pursuing dangerous criminals across star systems. Uses advanced technology and combat skills to capture fugitives.

background.name: Quantum Physicist
background.description: Theoretical scientist studying faster-than-light travel, parallel dimensions, and exotic matter. Pioneer of breakthrough technologies.

background.name: Colonial Rebel
background.description: Revolutionary fighting against oppressive galactic government or corporate control. Uses guerrilla tactics and underground networks.

background.name: Alien Contact Specialist
background.description: Expert in first contact protocols and interspecies communication. Trained to establish peaceful relations with newly discovered civilizations.

background.name: Starfighter Pilot
background.description: Combat pilot operating single-seat spacecraft in military engagements. Elite warrior with lightning reflexes and tactical expertise.

background.name: Space Medic
background.description: Medical professional treating injuries and diseases in zero gravity environments. Expert in alien physiology and space-related medical conditions.

background.name: Orbital Engineer
background.description: Construction specialist building and maintaining massive structures in space. Works on space elevators, ring worlds, and megastructures.

background.name: Galactic Archaeologist
background.description: Scholar studying ruins and artifacts of ancient alien civilizations. Uncovers lost technologies and forgotten histories across the galaxy.

background.name: Corporate Executive
background.description: High-ranking manager of interstellar mega-corporation controlling mining rights, trade routes, and colonial development across multiple worlds.

background.name: Refugee
background.description: Displaced person fleeing war, environmental disaster, or alien invasion. Struggles to find new home while carrying memories of lost world.

background.name: AI Programmer
background.description: Software engineer creating artificial intelligences for starship navigation, planetary management, and scientific research applications.

background.name: Wormhole Navigator
background.description: Specialist pilot capable of safely guiding ships through unstable space-time anomalies for instantaneous interstellar travel.

background.name: Genetic Designer
background.description: Biologist creating modified organisms for terraforming, agriculture, and adaptation to alien environments and atmospheric conditions.

background.name: Space Pirate
background.description: Outlaw raiding merchant vessels and isolated settlements. Operates from hidden bases in asteroid fields and uncharted systems.

background.name: Cryogenic Technician
background.description: Specialist managing suspended animation systems for long-duration space travel. Maintains life support for frozen passengers and crew.

background.name: Galactic Journalist
background.description: Reporter covering interplanetary news, alien encounters, and political developments across multiple star systems and civilizations.

background.name: Orbital Farmer
background.description: Agricultural specialist growing food in space-based hydroponics facilities. Feeds growing populations on space stations and colonies.

background.name: Psionic Operative
background.description: Individual with mental powers working for military or intelligence agencies. Uses telepathy, precognition, and telekinesis for covert operations.

background.name: Solar Engineer
background.description: Energy specialist maintaining fusion reactors, solar collectors, and power distribution systems across planets and space installations.

background.name: Alien Ambassador
background.description: Non-human representative working to establish peaceful relations between their species and other galactic civilizations.

background.name: Void Walker
background.description: Elite soldier trained for combat in the vacuum of space using specialized armor and maneuvering systems. Expert in zero-gravity warfare.

background.name: Galactic Librarian
background.description: Keeper of vast digital archives containing the collected knowledge of multiple civilizations. Protects information from loss or corruption.

background.name: Hyperspace Researcher
background.description: Scientist studying the physics of faster-than-light travel and alternate dimensions. Develops new propulsion technologies and navigation methods.

background.name: Colony Security Chief
background.description: Law enforcement officer maintaining order on frontier worlds. Deals with crime, alien threats, and civil unrest in remote settlements.

background.name: Stellar Cartographer
background.description: Navigator creating detailed maps of star systems, trade routes, and hazardous regions. Essential for safe interstellar travel.

background.name: Exobiologist
background.description: Researcher studying life forms that exist in extreme environments like gas giants, neutron stars, and the vacuum of space itself.

background.name: Space Salvager
background.description: Independent operator recovering valuable materials from derelict ships, abandoned stations, and battlefield wreckage across the galaxy.

background.name: Galactic Peacekeeper
background.description: Military officer serving in interstellar peacekeeping force. Intervenes in conflicts between worlds and protects neutral territories.
